MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool IsDBNull (int i);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsDBNull(int32 i) cil managed

Docs.summary: Used to indicate nonexistent values.
Docs.returns: if the specified column is equivalent to ; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Call this method to check for null column values before calling the typed get methods (for example, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.GetByte%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.GetChar%2A>, and so on) to avoid raising an error.
